DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Africa , Asia , Europe , Oceania , South America . The aim research study compare efficacy ( reduction HbA1c blood glucose level ) insulin detemir compare NPH insulin administer basal insulin treatment type 1 diabetes verify safety use ( number severity episodes hypoglycemia , body weight , insulin antibody side effect ) .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Insulin Detemir With NPH Insulin Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Type 1 diabetes Currently basalbolus regimen BMI = 35.0 kg/m2 HbA1c =11.0 % Proliferative retinopathy maculopathy Recurrent major hypoglycaemia Cardial problem Uncontrolled hypertension Impaired hepatic renal function
